Deploying Plug-In Component Managers

After you create a plug-in component manager, you deploy the component manager from the Composite Application Manager.

You can view a mappings table that includes component managers that are part of the Composite Application Manager framework, as well as plug-in component managers.

To deploy a plug-in component manager

  1. In the left pane, click Common Tasks.

  2. In the right pane, click Manage Plug-ins.

  3. Click the Plug-ins tab.

  4. In the File to Upload field, specify the fully qualified name of the WAR file.

  5. Click Deploy.
